description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows kernel elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-26176):

1. Identify the appropriate Windows update package for your system version from the list below.
2. Download and install the corresponding KB update mentioned.
3. Restart your system to apply the changes.

**Details**:
This update addresses the buffer over-read vulnerability that could allow an attacker to elevate privileges. 
Ensure that your system aligns with the provided build numbers and backup critical data before applying the updates.

**Update Packages**:
- Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5035853](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035853)
- Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5035853](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035853)
- Windows 11 Version 21H2: [KB5035854](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035854)
- Windows 10 for x64-based Systems: [KB5035858](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035858)
- Windows 10 for 32-bit Systems: [KB5035858](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035858)
- Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5035845](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035845)
- Windows 10 Version 21H2: [KB5035845](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035845)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running one of the specified builds.
- Backup critical data before applying updates.
